activities.text: Hello, main hoon Fluent—Aapka English mentor! Aaj hum seekhenge, agar aap public place par atak gaye ho, toh English mein help kaise maangna hai. Ready? Chaliye shuru karein!

activities.caption: Aap ek station ya airport par ho, aur direction nahi samajh aa raha hai. Kya karoge?

activities.text: Aapke dimaag mein shayad yeh thoughts aarahe honge: “Kaise poochun? English yaad nahi aa rahi!” Ya “Log mujhe judge toh nahi karenge?” Don’t worry, hum sab handle karenge.

activities.question: Sabse badi mushkil kya mehsoos karte ho jab public mein English bolni ho?
options: Words ya phrases yaad nahi aate

activities.text: Samajh gaya—yeh common worries hain! Par iss course ki madad se aapko sab step-by-step samajh aa jayega.

activities.title: Roadmap: Iss Course Mein Aap Kya Seekhoge?
activities.body:
• Lesson 2: Simple Greetings & Goodbyes – Dost aur new log se confidently baat karna.
• Lesson 3: Introducing Yourself – Apna parichay dena bina sharam.
• Lesson 4: Asking Simple Questions – “Kya yeh sahi hai?” “Mujhe yeh chahiye.”
• Lesson 5: Responding Clearly & Politely
• ...

Total 13 lessons mein hum aapko everyday conversation tak le jayenge. Course khatam hone tak, aap ek solid level par pahunch sakte ho!

activities.text: Agar overall course quizzes mein aapka score 80% ya zyada hua, toh final badge milega! Agar 50% se kam raha, toh dubara revise karke practice karna—main aapke saath hoon!

activities.title: Lesson 1 Focus: Urgent Help in Public
activities.body: Soch lo aap airport ya station par phase ho. English request karni hai. Chalo ek chhota scenario dekhte hain.

activities.text: Scenario: Aap ek airport par ho. Need help to find taxi stand. Log busy hain, aapko hichkichahat ho rahi hai. Kaise politely poochoge?

activities.prompt: Practice: “Excuse me, can you please tell me where the taxi stand is?”

activities.text: Dheere bolo, ek chhoti smile rakkho, aur 'Excuse me' se start karna politely attention grab karne ka best way hai.

activities.question: Politeness Check: Kaunsa line sabse respectful lagega?
options: Excuse me, can you please show me the taxi stand?
hints: ‘Excuse me’ + ‘please’ se request bohot polite lagti hai.
activities.encouragementOnFail: Koi baat nahi! Phir try karein. Politeness ke liye 'Excuse me' aur 'please' use karna yaad rakho.

activities.caption: 🎧 Listen: Kisi ko help request karte time tone kitna calm hai.

activities.prompt: Ab aap bolo: “Could you please help me? I’m a bit lost.”

activities.title: Relief
activities.body: Mera ek dost tha—usne panic mein bola: “Hey, you find my phone now!” Shopkeeper confuse ho gaya. Agar ‘Excuse me…’ use kiya hota, help jaldi mil jati!

activities.caption: 🎧 Thoda hasi-mazaak: Sunein kaise polite tone ki importance hai!

activities.question: Aapko kya lagta hai tone se sabse zyada impact hota hai?
options: Log aapki request ko kitna seriously lete hain
Tone se hi sab hota hai, words secondary hain

activities.title: Tone & Body Language
activities.body: Polite tone + relaxed body language se log aapki help karne mein zyada ready honge. Panic avoid karo!

activities.question: If you need directions but feel shy, which approach is best?
options: Excuse me...I’m sorry, but could you tell me where the exit is?
Bhai, jaldi batao, time nahi hai!
I lost. You come here now!
hints: ‘I’m sorry, but could you...’ shows polite hesitation.
activities.encouragementOnFail: Chalta hai, dobara try karo. 'Excuse me' aur 'I’m sorry' se request friendly lagti hai.

activities.text: Awesome! Dekha aap kitna easily polite tone maintain kar sakte ho.

activities.caption: 🔁 Repeat: 'Excuse me, could you please help me find...' in a confident voice!

activities.text: Is tarah aap aage ke lessons mein jitna practice karoge, utna hi comfortable feel karoge!

activities.title: Lesson Recap
activities.body:
• 'Excuse me' se politely start karo.
• 'Could you please...' or 'I’m sorry...' se request friendly ban jati hai.
• Tone + Smile = Log help karne ko tayyar honge.
• Panic mat karo—confidence se bolo, words se zyada calmness matter karti hai.

activities.text: Aapne yeh sab sikh liya? Superb! Ab aap public place par help request kar sakte ho, bina dare.
Yaad rakho, overall course score agar 80% se upar raha toh aapko final badge milega. Agar 50% se kam hua, koi tension nahi—dubara revise karo aur confident bano!

activities.title: Aage Ka Safar
activities.body: Next Lesson (Lesson 2) mein hum greetings aur goodbyes pe focus karenge. Har conversation ki pehli aur aakhri line important hai! Milte hain wahan! 👋
